info.title: Text Mining and NLP
info.description: Generate word & n-gram counts, compute text similarity, find & extract topics (keywords) from text , cluster sentence level texts, extract text from HTML pages.

post.description: Extract text contents from a HTML page or a URL directly. Can be used as a pre-step to any text processing task. For more info about this api, please visit http://www.rxnlp.com/api-reference/html2text-api/

Compute similarity between two units of texts using Jaccard, Cosine and Dice similarity measures. Can be used to find similar queries, ads, Tweets, product listings, documents, etc. This endpoint is language neutral. For more info, please check http://www.rxnlp.com/api-reference/text-similarity-api-reference/
Generate counts words or n-grams in descending order. N represents the required n-gram size.

Cluster sentences from a chunk of text. Use this when sentence boundary is unknown (e.g. a news article, a set of emails).                          Please find more detailed documentation here: http://www.rxnlp.com/api-reference/cluster-sentences-api-reference/

Extract topics from text. Extracted topics can be used to create navigable word clouds, automatic tagging of documents or for visualization of large amounts of text. You can extract topics from single documents or aggregated texts. API Documentation can be found here: http://www.rxnlp.com/api-reference/topics-and-themes-api-reference/
